statements: SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts;
SELECT id, transcript, timestamp FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, speaker_name FROM voice_transcripts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, duration FROM voice_transcripts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT speaker_name FROM voice_transcripts;
SELECT id, timestamp, duration, transcript, speaker_name FROM voice_transcripts WHERE duration > INTERVAL '5 minutes'
SELECT speaker_name, transcript FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 23:59:59' ORDER BY id
SELECT DISTINCT speaker_name FROM voice_transcripts WHERE transcript LIKE '%important%'
SELECT id, speaker_name, duration FROM voice_transcripts WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day' ORDER BY duration DESC
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT transcript, speaker FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, transcript FROM voice_transcripts ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT speaker, transcript FROM voice_transcripts WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, speaker, timestamp FROM voice_transcripts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT speaker, transcript FROM voice_transcripts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, transcript, speaker FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, speaker, timestamp FROM voice_transcripts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-05-01' AND timestamp < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT analysis_results.keywords, voice_transcripts.transcript, voice_transcripts.speaker FROM analysis_results JOIN voice_transcripts ON analysis_results.transcript_id = voice_transcripts.id;
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts;
SELECT id, transcript, speaker_name FROM voice_transcripts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT speaker_name, transcript FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM transcript_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker_name = 'Alice'
SELECT transcript_id, analysis_result FROM transcript_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT id, transcript FROM voice_transcripts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT speaker_name, COUNT(*) FROM voice_transcripts GROUP BY speaker_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts;
SELECT transcript_text, transcript_date FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker_id = 1;
SELECT transcript_date, transcript_text FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker_id = 2 ORDER BY transcript_date DESC;
SELECT speaker_name FROM speakers WHERE speaker_id = 3;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result, analysis_date FROM voice_analysis;
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts WHERE transcript_id = 1;
SELECT speaker_name, transcript_text FROM voice_transcripts INNER JOIN speakers ON voice_transcripts.speaker_id = speakers.speaker_id;
SELECT transcript_text, transcript_date FROM voice_transcripts ORDER BY transcript_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_result FROM voice_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts WHERE speaker_id = (SELECT speaker_id FROM speakers WHERE speaker_name = 'Jane');
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_gender FROM speakers WHERE speaker_id = 1;
SELECT conversation_date, conversation_location FROM conversations WHERE conversation_location = 'Office';
SELECT keyword_text, keyword_category FROM keywords WHERE keyword_category = 'Technology';
SELECT transcript_id, analysis_result FROM transcript_analysis WHERE keyword_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts ORDER BY transcript_timestamp DESC;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_gender FROM speakers WHERE speaker_gender = 'M';
SELECT conversation_location, conversation_date FROM conversations WHERE conversation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY conversation_location;
SELECT keyword_text, keyword_category FROM keywords WHERE keyword_category = 'Tech' AND keyword_text LIKE '%data%';

SELECT transcript_text, analysis_result FROM voice_transcripts JOIN transcript_analysis ON voice_transcripts.transcript_id = transcript_analysis.transcript_id WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%' LIMIT 5;
